ComicInfo.Summary:
When one of Shuri's inventions falls into the wrong hands, she and Black Panther must race against time before the machine can be used as a weapon against all of humanity!
Rising stars Vita Ayala and Arianna Florean conclude their story arc!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Arianna Florean | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Juan Samu (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 2 |
